page.title: 08 Coleford Post Office
page.content: On Wednesday 19th June a group from our school went to{Coleford}post office.We had to stay there for a little while because the{shopkeeper had not come.When she came she took us in the {post office}where the{stamps} and{Giro bank}was.While we were there we asked her some questions. How long have you worked here ? She said she had worked here for eleven years. { } When was the post office built? It was built in 1969.Then we went out into the shop and the{postmaster came in and we asked him some questions.We went and saw the{shop where they had all the things that they sold. In the{shop}were lots of things like sweets, food, painting things, etc. The{shopkeeper}told us that we could have some leaflets.
